sn1.31:1: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—​ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ vihārati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. Atha kho sambahulā satullapakāyikā devatāyo abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhaṁsu.
sn1.31:2: "Sabbhireva samāsetha,sabbhi kubbetha santhavaṁ;Sataṁ saddhammamaññāya,seyyo hoti na pāpiyo"ti.
sn1.31:3: Atha kho aparā devatā bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn1.31:4: "Sabbhireva samāsetha,sabbhi kubbetha santhavaṁ;Sataṁ saddhammamaññāya,paññā labbhati nāññato"ti.
sn1.31:5: Atha kho aparā devatā bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn1.31:6: "Sabbhireva samāsetha,sabbhi kubbetha santhavaṁ;Sataṁ saddhammamaññāya,sokamajjhe na socatī"ti.
sn1.31:7: Atha kho aparā devatā bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn1.31:9: Atha kho aparā devatā bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn1.31:10: "Sabbhireva samāsetha,sabbhi kubbetha santhavaṁ;Sataṁ saddhammamaññāya,sattā gacchanti suggatin"ti.
sn1.31:11: Atha kho aparā devatā bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn1.31:12: "Sabbhireva samāsetha,sabbhi kubbetha santhavaṁ;Sataṁ saddhammamaññāya,sattā tiṭṭhanti sātatan"ti.
sn1.31:13: Atha kho aparā devatā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca: "kassa nu kho, bhagavā, subhāsitan"ti?
sn1.31:14: "Sabbāsaṁ vo subhāsitaṁ pariyāyena, api ca mamapi suṇātha –
sn1.31:15: Sabbhireva samāsetha,sabbhi kubbetha santhavaṁ;Sataṁ saddhammamaññāya,sabbadukkhā pamuccatī"ti.
sn1.31:16: Idamavoca bhagavā. Attamanā tā devatāyo bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyiṁsūti.
